s.text: the summer weather that has lasted beyond its normal term ...
For example, if you have IE4 installed, when you click on an author's name a short bio pops up (instead of the click taking you to the bio at the bottom of the page).

For example, if you have IE4 installed, when you click on an author's name a short bio pops up (instead of the click taking you to the bio at the bottom of the page).
One can lead a happy and fulfilling life, and even use the Internet contentedly, without understanding "cookies."
For example, we tell your browser to remember the date of your visit.
Similarly, we use cookies to remember whether you prefer your contents listed by page number or by date of posting, and to remember which entry in a "Dispatch" or "Dialogue" you last read.
When you come back the next time, your computer sends that date back to ours.
Slate is already adding features to take advantage of IE4's enormous power, beauty, and sophistication.
